job_info.title: Research Scientist - Generative AI
job_info.description:
Join NVIDIA Research to work on Generative AI and Foundation Models.
                Push the boundaries of AI capabilities.
requirements: PhD or equivalent experience in ML/AI
Publications in top-tier venues (NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR)
Strong coding skills in Python, PyTorch

highlights: Deployed Ollama, llama.cpp, vllm, TensorRT-LLM, mlc-llm
CureAgent framework, Executor-Analyst architecture, tool-augmented reasoning
NeurIPS 2025 CureBench Global 2nd Place - AI Agent development
Deployed on Thor, Orin, Jetson platforms with 4x latency reduction
